name: Firebrick.ui
tagline: UI extendable component library for Firebrick MVC, built with Knockout, Bootstrap and jQuery
body:
#Firebrick UI

[http://www.firebrickjs.com](http://www.firebrickjs.com)

UI extendable component library for Firebrick MVC, built with :

* Firebrick MVC
* jQuery
* Bootstrap
* Knockout JS
* Require JS

## Install with Bower
```
bower install "firebrick.ui"
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
